
                            
                            <p>登录手机银行首页就有抽奖，每天一次，红包扫安徽农金的收款码就可以使用，基本上省内店里都有。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/123428wy2xnficbxtsu55x.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/09/123428wy2xnficbxtsu55x.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p>
